I mentioned this fic before when it was uploaded to

fics.com

However, I found more interesting historical information well aft=
er I
completed the fic which may sort of buttress the fictional scenario.

=
I don't know what to say about this fic --- all I know is that
hopefully hi=
storical Fujita Goro was unaware of the details
surrounding the fight for K=
ondou's life. 

Satsuma was more inclined to save Kondou while Tosa wanted =
Kondou
executed based on their belief that the Shinsengumi had murdered Ryo=
ma
Sakamoto. The strongest voice came from Tosa man Tani Tateki. 

So I wil=
l explain how historically Fujita Goro was always "one spot"
away from Tani=
 Tateki the man who really pushed for the death penalty
for Kondou Isami.

=
so here is a diagram (ignore the names in the [middle], just notice
how Fuj=
ita Goro is "close" to *Tani).  The relationships are
especially strong in =
the years right after Fujita Goro retired from
the Tokyo Metropolitan Polic=
e Dept.

ans, it is well known that

e and Tani ALSO was at

Tateki

#3 [weakest conne=
ction]

the =

wa Hiroshi (+) Takamine Hideo and (+) Jigoro Kano all
interacted on a profe=
ssional and personal level extensively as well
however it is NOT CLEAR if T=
ani's memoirs (WHICH CLEARLY STATED HIS

s published during Fujita Goro's

ddle] such as Yamakawa

GORO was formerly

nd
